      • addFood

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=POST)
public Food addFood​(@RequestParam("name")
                    java.lang.String name,
                    @RequestParam("price")
                    int price,
                    @RequestParam("category")
                    FoodCategory category,
                    @RequestParam("seller")
                    int sellerId)
        create API post request for add new food to database
        Parameters:
        name - name of food
        price - price for food
        category - category or type of food
        sellerId - seller that sell the food
